text: Heidenheim (German: Landkreis Heidenheim, Alemannic German: Landchrais Hoedne) is a rural district (Landkreis) in the east of Baden-Württemberg, Germany. Neighboring districts are Ostalbkreis, Dillingen, Günzburg, Alb-Donau and Göppingen. The capital is Heidenheim an der Brenz. == Towns and municipalities == Cities Administrative districts Municipalities #Giengen (Brenz) #Heidenheim (Brenz) #Herbrechtingen #Niederstotzingen #Giengen #Heidenheim #Sontheim- Niederstotzingen #Dischingen #Gerstetten #Hermaringen #Königsbronn #Nattheim #Sontheim (Brenz) #Steinheim am Albuch == References == == Other websites == * Official website
